bug.author: CatherineSue
bug.description: Tf/DDPG and HER use gym.GoalEnv. To wrap GoalEnv with TfEnv, we need to add a Dict space into garage. All the primitives relevant to DDPG should be changed to use TfEnv after adding GarageDict to garage.spaces. Refer: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/rlworkgroup/garage/pull/264>#264</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://github.com/rlworkgroup/garage/pull/270>#270</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: The DeterministicMLPPolicy should be able to use once this is fixed, then add a unit test of DeterministicMLPPolicy.
